c74object.name: schedulemessage
c74object.digest: A generalised delay or pipe for any message type
c74object.description: Schedule a message to happen at some point in the current timing thread (high priority when overdrive is on), otherwise all events are executed in a single low priority thread.

objarg.name: delay time
objarg.description: Set the delay time in milliseconds before outputting. If no delay time is set, schedulemessage will output immediately.

method.name: bang
method.digest: Outputs after the set amount of time.
method.description: Outputs the same as the input after the set amount of time. If overdrive is on then the output will be in the high priority thread.
